[NOTE: Manifest Bug prevents Nuget package from working! Be gentle... it's my first Nuget attempt! Clone from Github and build from Source for now... will fix soon]

First release of Moksy: a Web Service Mocking/Faking/Simulation Framework
summary: Moksy is an open source .Net library for stubbing, mocking and simulating web services on a real HTTP Service end-point.
title: Moksy - An open source library for testing HTTP Services.
